title: How to Switch Between Instagram Accounts on a Computer

steps.title: Go to https://instagram.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://instagram.com in a web browser. You can use any browser to add account log-ins to your Instagram . If you aren't already logged into an account, do so now. Before you can switch accounts on Instagram, you must first add a second account .

steps.title: Click Switch.
steps.content: Click Switch . You'll see this next to your account username on the top-right side of the page. [1] X Research source If you don't see this link, click ☰ More , and then click Switch accounts . A pop-up menu will open with a login screen.

steps.title: Enter your second account details.
steps.content: Enter your second account details. You'll need to provide the phone number, username, or email address and password to log in.

steps.title: Check the box for "Save login info".
steps.content: Check the box for "Save login info". If you don't do this, you'll need to enter your login details every time, and you won't be able to switch easily.

steps.title: Click Log in.
steps.content: Click Log in . This is the blue button. You'll be logged into your second account.

steps.title: Click Switch to switch accounts.
steps.content: Click Switch to switch accounts. This is in the top-right corner, next to your current profile picture.

steps.title: Switch accounts.
steps.content: Switch accounts. When you have more than one account logged in and saved to your browser, you can easily switch between them. Click Switch in the top-right corner, next to your profile picture. Click the other account.

steps.title: Log out of both accounts and log in again.
steps.content: Log out of both accounts and log in again. If you're having trouble staying logged into both accounts, try signing out of all accounts first.

steps.title: Clear your browser cache.
steps.content: Clear your browser cache. You may have corrupted data, and clearing your cache can help. This can be done for all websites or just the Instagram website.

steps.title: Set a password for the second account.
steps.content: Set a password for the second account. If you created a second account using the same login information, you must input a new password to switch. Do the following: Click ☰ More . Click Settings . Click Accounts Center . Select the second account. Click Avatar to prompt the password change. Click Forgot password . Set a new password (or use the same as the first account). Save your changes.
